steps.name: customer click on continue button
customer enter fullname
customer enter whatsapp number
customer enter emailID
customer click on send otp button
Extract the OTP from whatsapp number and enter into whatsapp number field
Extract the OTP from email and enter into emailid field
customer click on verify account button
then user navigate to create password page
customer enter password
customer enter confirm password
customer click on create Account button with confirmation message
Profile profile view page will display
click on logout button
close the application
